testcase.classname: validating whole process from making an appointment to receiving an invoice
testcase.name: patient makes an appointment and gets an invoice after whole process, which is done by admin, doctor and staff.
testcase.system-out: Given User registers to the page as a "patient".............................passed And Admin signs in and assign user as a "patient"...........................passed And Patient signs in and makes an appointment...............................passed And User registers to the page as a "staff".................................passed And Admin signs in and assign user as a "staff".............................passed And The staff signs in and approves the appointment.........................passed And The staff assigns the appointment to a doctor...........................passed And The doctor edits the appointment by asking test results.................passed And The staff approves the test request and updates it......................passed And The doctor views test results, gives prescription, changes status as completed and request inpatient.passed And The staff approves inpatient request and assigns a room for patient.....passed And The doctor updates status inpatient as discharged.......................passed And The staff views updated status and creates an invoice...................passed When The patient views the invoice..........................................passed Then The patient has an heart attack........................................passed
